parameters.name: Axis
parameters.description: 0 = X axis 1 = Y axis 2 = Z axis

title: IMassProperty.IGetPrincipleAxesOfInertia
description: Gets the principal axes of inertia for this model.

parameters.name: Axis
parameters.description: 0 = X axis 1 = Y axis 2 = Z axis

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of size 3 (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
This method returns:
a vector that represents the requested axis.
metric units unless explicitly specified otherwise.
The return value is a 0-based array of doubles:
[
lx, ly, lz
]
